name: Must Do Tour: The Heart Of Paris
description: As amazing as Paris is, the city can also be overwhelming. But never fear, Culturefish! Tours are here! Our free* walking tours give you a fun orientation to this spectacular city. We tell stories and fun facts that impress and amuse. We also promote understanding between cultures from around the world. You'll even learn a few "magic" words and how to use them with the locals. Our tours will help you enjoy your time in Paris to the absolute fullest!
